data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Monro, Alex K., Wei, Y. G., Chen, C. J. (2012): Three new species of Pilea (Urticaceae) from limestone karst in China. PhytoKeys 19: 51-66, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.19.3968, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.19.3968
